about_the_game:
Get behind the wheel of a planetary rover and travel through ruins lost in the sands to discover what's hidden deep within the sand dunes. Sell your loot to the locals and fulfill their quests to learn about the crazy past of these places. Equip your transportation with advanced equipment to mine more gems and rare animal skins from the most hidden corners and reach the distant hills. But keep an eye on the time: you won't be happy with the fearsome creatures that may come to visit you under the cover of night...

Explore the dunes and uncover their secrets

Start your life with a clean slate in New Arkham Colony From there you'll travel into the desert, scouring the rubble of ancient buildings for treasures and trapping giant creatures and giant saber-toothed worms, of which there are more than 30. Explore each of the areas invented by Lovecraft, complete quests and travel to neighboring fantasy regions, each with its own unique features, inhabitants and secrets.

Mining artifacts

Someone really wants you to dig into the past, but can they be trusted? Madness is contagious.

Watch out at night

Danger is everywhere: watch out for huge worms and hiding geese. But the worst is in the darkness that covers the sands as soon as the sun goes down....

Game Features

Uncover the ultimate mystery: at the wheel of a planetary rover, you can travel to lost habitats in the wilderness, each with its own inhabitants, Mi-Go, Tindal, Yog-Sothoth, Nyarlathotep, Elder Ones and others....

Mine: treasure awaits in the sands and debris, and completed quests from the locals will help you acquire many unique skills in your arsenal.

Hone your craft: learn new equipment and upgrade your all-terrain vehicle to hunt rare species of monsters and find buried treasures and mysterious artifacts.

Earn a living by hunting: by selling your prey to the locals, you can learn what's happening on the planet, improve your rover and travel to even more remote places.

Fight back against madness: strengthen your mind and use what you've learned to survive in the terrible desert after sunset.

short_description: The Sands of Yuggoth is a single-player game where you hunt, mine, explore and uncover the sinister secrets of Yuggoth. Sell your loot, upgrade your rover and scour the desert in search of long-buried secrets. Explore the mysterious planet created by the mad genius of Howard Phillips Lovecraft.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Russian
